title: I Need An Eraser
description: I Need an Eraser is a short story that describes what one boy does when he makes a mistake while writing. When he finally locates an eraser to correct his mistake, he encounters a new problem--a hole in his paper caused by erasing his mistake. Pictures and repetitive text support the reader.
meta: drawer, eraser, fixed, found, mistake, need
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
Problem and Solution : Identify the story elements of problem and solution
Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Dd
Capitalization : Understand the use of a capital letter at the beginning of a sentence
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency words my and your

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
